pageTitle: Itinerary for Thursday, October 12, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Thursday, October 12, 2017:

Washington, D.C., United States

8:15 a.m. The Prime Minister and Ms. Grégoire Trudeau will depart Washington for Mexico City, Mexico.

Andrews Air Force Base
Washington, D.C., United States

Note for media:

  • Closed to media

Mexico City, Mexico

12:00 p.m. The Prime Minister and Ms. Grégoire Trudeau will arrive in Mexico City.

Benito Juárez International Airport

Note for media:

  • Photo opportunity upon arrival

12:55 p.m. The Prime Minister, accompanied by Ms. Grégoire Trudeau, will lay a wreath at the Altar of the Nation at Chapultepec Park.

Chapultepec Park

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

1:25 p.m. The Prime Minister and Ms. Grégoire Trudeau will visit the Mexican Red Cross Headquarters.

Mexican Red Cross Headquarters

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

3:15 p.m. The Prime Minister, the Minister of Foreign Affairs, Chrystia Freeland, and the Minister of International Trade, Francois-Philippe Champagne, will participate in a roundtable discussion with civil society leaders.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting

5:10 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend a welcoming ceremony with military honours.

Palacio Nacional

Note for media:

  • Photo opportunity

5:40 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the President of Mexico, Enrique Peña Nieto.

Blue Room
Palacio Nacional

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

6:00 p.m. The Prime Minister, the Minister of Foreign Affairs, Chrystia Freeland, and the Minister of International Trade, Francois-Philippe Champagne, will hold an expanded bilateral meeting with the President of Mexico.

Ambassador's Salon
Palacio Nacional

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

7:45 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a joint media availability with the President of Mexico.

Honour Courtyard
Palacio Nacional

Note for media:

  • Open coverage

8:30 p.m. The Prime Minister and Ms. Grégoire Trudeau will attend an official dinner given by the President of Mexico.

Treasury Room, Ground Floor
Palacio Nacional

Note for media:

  • Open coverage for toasts

Note: all times local
